title: GDG DevFest West 2015 Summary
brief: GDG DevFest West 2015 almost a behind us, and we think it was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from last years event

title: GDG DevFest 2016 Announced
brief: GDG DevFest West 2016 is announced! The next edition of GDG-SV's conference about Google technologies will take place on **November 13th** in Mountain View.

title: Call for Proposals
brief: A bit less than two months from now DevFest West is upon. If you want to present [please submit your proposal here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdbyS5xQHFLKDWUe9qnCi-grB3QcBkFqk7Qufmz0KsDdy8PsA/viewform#responses).
